songs.title: Touch/Shout Out to My Ex (Live from Nickelodeon Kids’ Choice Awards 2017)
songs.lyrics:
[Touch: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
You and I and nobody else
Feeling feelings I've never felt
The way you got me under your spell
Don't you keep it all to yourself

[Touch: Perrie Edwards]
My heart is racing
Gotta slow it down, but I'm so impatient
Want to hold you know, but I know you're playing
Glad I told you I hate chasin', don't you keep it all to yourself

[Touch: All]
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet all week
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet, all week
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your lo-ove

[Touch: Jesy Nelson & All]
Photograph with no T-shirt on
Why you making me wait so long? (Wait so long?)
I promise to keep this a secret, I'll never tell
But don't you keep it all to yourself, doo-doo-doo-doo-doo-doo-doo, no-oh

[Touch: Jade Thirlwall]
My heart is racing
Gotta slow it down, but I'm so impatient
Want to hold you know, but I know you're playing
Glad I told you I hate chasin', don't you keep it all to yourself, to yourself

[Touch: All]
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet, all week
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body
Just a touch of your lo-ove
Just a touch of your lo-ove

[Touch: All]
And now my whole week, my whole week is golden
'Cause I know that this could be something real

Just a touch of your love, t-t-touch—
Just a touch of your love (To-to-touch)
Just a touch of your love—
Shout out to my ex
Just a touch of your love—
Shout out to my ex

[Shout Out to My Ex: All, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Perrie Edwards & Jade Thirlwall]
Shout out to my ex, you're really quite the man
You made my heart break and that made me who I am
Here's to my ex, hey, look at me now
Well, I'm, I'm all the way up, I swear you'll never bring me down
(You'll never bring me down)
Shout out to my ex, you're really quite the man (Eh-hey-eh)
You made my heart break and that made me who I am
Here's to my ex, hey, look at me now
(Won't you just look at me now?)
Well, I'm, I'm all the way up
I swear you'll never, you'll never bring me down, ooh

[Shout Out to My Ex: All & Jesy Nelson]
(Oh, oh, oh-oh-oh)
(Oh, oh, oh-oh-oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh-oh-oh)
(Oh, oh, oh-oh-oh, oh)
Yeah, hey, oh
(Oh, oh, oh-oh-oh)
(Oh, oh, oh-oh-oh, oh)
Oh, nah, nah
(Oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh)
You'll never bring me down
